tasks.task: Install and configure a watering system with a valve control panel.
subtasks: Assemble the valve pack and house water selector valve.
Connect the water tank intake and ensure proper flow rate.
Install sensors and prepare for future sensor additions.
Operate the zone valves for water distribution.
Interface with the Raspberry Pi control system using a web-based frontend.
Implement the If This Then That (IFTTT) engine for automated watering decisions.
Integrate weather data to adjust watering schedules during rain delays.
Monitor system performance and set up alerts for leaks or malfunctions.
Continuously update and improve the irrigation system’s software functionalities.
